Description:
Not Just Another Pretty Face
Be wowed by the charm and character of this stunning 1940's home. It has recently been restored with love and is ready to be enjoyed. There is absolutely nothing left to do here, just enjoy its exquisite features & desirable location. Featuring 3 generous bedrooms all with ceiling fans, Master with double doors to a sun-filled side courtyard, walk in robe & 3 piece ensuite. Intricate ceiling detail, large architraves, original art deco fireplaces & breathtaking leadlight windows pay tribute to the homes true era and takes you back in time. If you appreciate charisma & eye catching elements then it will be hard to not fall in love with this one. A modern kitchen update ensures the home is suited to today's market with quality appliances, plenty of storage & bench space. Be spoilt by the size of the main bathroom which features a luxe, freestanding bath, large shower, toilet, modern vanity and a great feel. Externally, you will find all new fencing, fresh landscaping incorporating two divine sitting areas & a sought after location. So close to BSE, multiple childcares, St Thereses & Kennington PS, Latrobe University, Strath & Kennington Village, Strath Haven & a short walk to the CBD means you could sleepwalk to school or work!
This special home must be seen to be truly appreciated, it wont last long.

Description:
Modern Cottage Situated Minutes Away From The Heart of Bendigo!
Situated only minutes away from the heart of Bendigo and just one block from the McIvor Road commercial centre, this modern cottage style home offers potential owners a great location and lifestyle opportunity. Sitting on a large block in one of Kenningtons most sought after pockets, number 18 Hodgkinson Street presents an ideal opportunity for couples, small families, retirees, investors or those buying their first home.
The home features a well sized, recently updated kitchen which has plenty of bench and cupboard space and modern amenities. The living and dining room are combined into an open plan living area which is complimented by 9 foot ceilings, a solid fuel heater, ceiling fan, refrigerated split system AC/heater and decorative ceiling rose features.
The two bedrooms are spacious and include original features such as the decorative ceiling rose, open fireplace and timber framed sash windows. The master bedroom also includes a built in robe. The family bathroom has been recently renovated and is functional and of good size. The laundry is also well sized and features a second toilet. Keeping to its cottage style, this house has polished hardwood floorboards throughout, a large central entry hall and a recently painted weatherboard exterior.
An extensive garden and large backyard with an outdoor seating area makes the perfect setting for entertaining. A bonus feature of the established garden includes an array of fruit trees including plums, nectarines, apples, pears, raspberries, strawberries, grapes, almonds and pomegranates - which are all watered by three 2000L rain water tanks and an electric pump.
The large rear yard also lends itself to further subdivision (STCA), which is assisted by the wide driveway and lack of planning overlays (e.g. no Heritage Overlay).
The property is also fully fenced and includes a large colorbond shed which is connected to electricity and an attached car port / pergola. Additional features of note include underfloor and ceiling insulation.
An inspection is a must for this gem of a home.

Description:
PRIME OPPORTUNITY IN A FANTASTIC POSITION
This immaculate property, having being occupied by a single owner since its build in 1961, is an amazing opportunity in a great location. Situated directly across from Strath Village Shopping Centre, bus stop right out the front and walking distance to schools, La Trobe University and many other amenities, this neat and tidy yellow brick home offers loads of potential.
With ample off-street parking and a concrete drive leading down to double garage, this neat yellow brick home offers a lovely garden with established rose bushes. The paved front entry opens into a wide hall, complete with built-in coat closet and glass sliding doors lead into the light and bright living area. Double aspect windows and a gas heater offer plenty of warmth and this generous space opens on to another living area, which could also be used as a formal dining. A third living area, created as a sunroom/conservatory at the rear of the property, means there is plenty of scope for living arrangements.
Quality timber floorboards can be found under the carpeted areas of the home and the owners have recently installed ducted heating and cooling throughout. Large windows provide plenty of natural light and quality details, such as ornate architraves, indicate the quality of the original build.
The second living space leads through to the bright and light open plan kitchen and dining room. Refurbished to freshen the space and include all modern conveniences; this room still retains a retro feel and the spacious, built-in pantry is a wonderful addition.
Other internal features include a neat linen press in the hallway providing extra storage, a large disabled access bathroom offers ample space for a wheelchair or walker. An additional separate toilet is also hugely practical.
Back towards the front of the home, three good-sized bedrooms all feature built-in robes and ceiling fans.
A sliding door through to the hallway will take you to a large laundry with built-in storage. A wide ramp leading down to the backyard is perfect for wheelchair and/or disabled access. The neat, lawned garden also features a paved, undercover space; an open paved area with a built-in BBQ; raised garden bed and planting throughout. Access from both the driveway and the side gate at the other end of the house provide practical connections to the rear of the house.
This practical and well-designed home has lovingly served a local family for years and it is ideal for a young family, retirees searching for a convenient location, or even a clinical practice after a high profile, easily accessible destination.

The ultimate sanctuary for busy families
Tucked away in an elevated court in the highly sought after “dress circle” of Kennington on the high side of the Reservoir, this ten year old two storey ultra-modern home provides the ultimate sanctuary for busy families. Ideally located in walking distance to the new Kennington Village including Edwards Providore for lazy breakfasts or that all important coffee and on the door step of the Kennington Reservoir and its tranquil bush surrounds. Uniquely all levels of Education are catered for locally from Kindergarten all the way through to University including in-demand Primary and Secondary Colleges. The family car will only be required for the short seven minute drive into the Bendigo CBD.
The low maintenance split level home and block have been cleverly designed to meet the ever-changing demands of today’s modern family. There is provision for off street parking for up to five vehicles and a flexible floor plan that can be configured to provide three living spaces and four bedrooms with built in robes or five bedrooms and two living if needed. The stunning outdoor entertaining zone with laser cut decorative screen, water feature and sophisticated accent lighting provides an additional living option complete with ceiling fan and large sheltered alfresco.
The double height entrance opens on to a central hallway with internal garage access on the left and first of the three living spaces on the right. Positioned behind double doors this could be utilised as a formal living room, theatre room or fifth bedroom; ideal for guest accommodation. This room is serviced by an adjacent powder room with handy access to the open plan kitchen-dining-living zone and alfresco behind three glass stacker doors. The sleek galley kitchen with glass accent window and white tile splashback, stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances looks beautiful, but is also highly functional. With a fusion of high gloss white and matte dark cabinetry, double sink, Miele dishwasher, electric wall oven, convection microwave, gas cooktop and walk in pantry.
All remaining double bedrooms have walk in robes and are located on the second level accessed via a stunning internal timber staircase with stainless steel wire balustrade. The third living zone is positioned at the top of the stairs overlooking the entrance foyer. The parents retreat features a dual access walk through robe with built in cabinetry, ensuite with his and her vanities, oversized shower and separate toilet and private balcony overlooking the family friendly court and bush beyond. The remaining bedrooms are serviced by a separate toilet and modern family bathroom with vanity, glass tile splashback, shower and deep bath.
Additional features include:
• Highly considered storage options, cabinetry & LED lighting throughout
• Purpose built utility room including modem and data points off large laundry
• TV points in master and three living zones
• Ducted refrigerated cooling & ducted gas heating
• Double garage with auto roller door & internal and rear yard access
• Additional under-stair storage
• Rain water tank with pump & practical garden shed
• External gas outlet for outdoor entertaining
This property delivers a peaceful and versatile retreat with modern styling in a prestige location.
